thread.title: Fresh Watermelon Margarita For National Watermelon Day
thread.title_full: Fresh Watermelon Margarita For National Watermelon Day - Forbes

author: Nick Passmore
title: Fresh Watermelon Margarita For National Watermelon Day
text:
Refreshing perfection in a cocktail.
It might have slipped your notice, but today (8/3/15) is National Watermelon Day – is there any day these days that isn’t National Something Day? It seems not. Anyway, as absurd as all this promotional hucksterism is, there’s no reason not to take advantage of it by shaking up this delicious summer cocktail.
Here’s how:
4 ounce Tequila Don Julio Blanco 12
6 ounces seedless watermelon
juice 1/4 lemon and 1/4 lime
1/2 ounce Grand Marnier
Sprig of mint for garnish
Blend together tequila, Grand Marnier, watermelon, lemon and lime juice.
Pour into shaker filled with ice and shake well.
Rim two glasses with sugar
Pour in the margarita mix and garnish with mint.
2 servings
